text: Thank you for your reply, Matthew! I'm talking about analyzing events collected from the site.

Hi everybody! It's the first time I use API Key, hope you can help me!
My website is a Wordpress one and I have inserted the javascript code and the php code HubSpot create with the generated key. The problem now is that the PHP code appears visible in the page and the live chat instead doesn't appear. I think I didn't inserted it correctly so I would ask you: which is the correct way to insert it in Wordpress?
Thank you for your help!
